main event: A red light approximately 1 inch in diameter and 1 and 1/2 miles in length was observed moving from south to north at a speed of 180 degrees per second in Pueblo, Colorado on October 6, 1956.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 1 and 1/2 minutes,The object moved in a straight line without variation,The sighting was concluded as an aircraft or astronomical phenomenon,The observers were unable to classify the object definitively,The report is part of Project Blue Book documenting UFO sightings.
